content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings Maryam, thank you for your interest in our apartment in Magdeburg. To commence our negotiation, let me start with a proposed rental price of 1250 Euros per month. Now, please share your offer so we can work towards coming to an agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for sharing the initial price. I don't want to continue the negotiation at this moment because I need time to evaluate my budget and think of a fair counteroffer. Once I have that, we can resume the conversation.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Understood, Maryam. Please take your time to evaluate your budget and consider a suitable offer. When you're ready to proceed with negotiations, feel free to reach out again. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
